/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
